patched_yaml:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mycronjob
spec:
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: mycron-container
            image: alpine:stable
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - echo elastic world ; sleep 5
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - NET_RAW
                - NET_ADMIN
                - SYS_ADMIN
                - SYS_MODULE
                - SYS_PTRACE
                - SYS_CHROOT
              privileged: false
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
  concurrencyPolicy: Allow

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mycronjob
spec:
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: mycron-container
            image: alpine:stable
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - echo elastic world ; sleep 5
            securityContext:
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
              privileged: false
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - NET_RAW
                - NET_ADMIN
                - SYS_ADMIN
                - SYS_MODULE
                - SYS_PTRACE
                - SYS_CHROOT
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
  concurrencyPolicy: Allow

kind: CronJob
metadata:

spec:

  jobTemplate:
    spec:

        spec:

          - name: mycron-container
            image: alpine:stable
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - echo elastic world ; sleep 5
            securityContext:
              runAsNonRoot: true
              privileged: false
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - NET_RAW
                - NET_ADMIN
                - SYS_ADMIN

                - SYS_CHROOT

          restartPolicy: OnFailure

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mycronjob
spec:
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: mycron-container
            image: alpine:stable
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - echo elastic world ; sleep 5
            resources:
              requests:
                cpu: 100m
                memory: 128Mi
              limits:
                cpu: 500m
                memory: 256Mi
            securityContext:
              privileged: false
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - NET_RAW
                - NET_ADMIN
                - SYS_ADMIN
                - SYS_MODULE
                - SYS_PTRACE
                - SYS_CHROOT
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
  concurrencyPolicy: Allow

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ecsdemo-nodejs
  labels:
    app: ecsdemo-nodejs
  namespace: ecsdemo-nodejs
spec:
  replicas: 6
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ecsdemo-nodejs
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%
      maxUnavailable: 25%
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ecsdemo-nodejs
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: brentley/ecsdemo-nodejs:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: ecsdemo-nodejs
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ecsdemo-nodejs
  labels:
    app: ecsdemo-nodejs
  namespace: ecsdemo-nodejs
spec:
  replicas: 6
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ecsdemo-nodejs
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%
      maxUnavailable: 25%
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ecsdemo-nodejs
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: brentley/ecsdemo-nodejs:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: ecsdemo-nodejs
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - ecsdemo-nodejs
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - ecsdemo-nodejs
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - ecsdemo-nodejs

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: apache-storm-nimbus
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    storm: nimbus
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        storm: nimbus
        app: storm
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: zookeeper
        image: zcguan/storm-cluster:stable
        env:
        - name: CONFIGURE_ZOOKEEPER
          value: 'true'
        - name: STORM_CMD
          value: nimbus
        volumeMounts:
        - name: storm-data
          mountPath: /opt/apache-storm/storm-local
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: storm-data
        emptyDir: {}

apiVersion: batch/v1beta1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: image-build-cron-trigger
spec:
  schedule: 0 2 * * *
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          initContainers:
          - name: git
            env:
            - name: GIT_REPOSITORY
              value: github.com/tektoncd/plumbing
            - name: GIT_REVISION
              value: main
            image: busybox:stable
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - NET_RAW
                - NET_ADMIN
                - SYS_ADMIN
                - SYS_MODULE
                - SYS_PTRACE
                - SYS_CHROOT
              privileged: false
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          containers:
          - name: trigger
            env:
            - name: SINK_URL
              value: el-image-builder.default.svc.cluster.local:8080
            - name: TARGET_IMAGE
              value: gcr.io/tekton-releases/dogfooding/buildx-gcloud
            - name: CONTEXT_PATH
              value: tekton/images/buildx-gcloud
            image: busybox:stable
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - NET_RAW
                - NET_ADMIN
                - SYS_ADMIN
                - SYS_MODULE
                - SYS_PTRACE
                - SYS_CHROOT
              privileged: false
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nodehelloworld.example.com
  labels:
    app: helloworld
spec:
  containers:
  - name: k8s-demo
    image: diyblockchain/k8s-demo:stable
    ports:
    - name: nodejs-port
      containerPort: 3000
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: maskrcnn-image-seg
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: image-seg
        image: centaurusinfra/test1_maskrcnn:stable
        command:
        - python
        args:
        - -m
        - torch.distributed.launch
        - --nproc_per_node
        - '2'
        - tools/train_net.py
        - --config-file
        - configs/e2e_mask_rcnn_R_50_FPN_1x.yaml
        - --max_steps
        - '100'
        - OUTPUT_DIR
        - /results
        resources:
          limits:
            nvidia.com/gpu: 2
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /datasets/data
          name: remote-data
        - mountPath: /results
          name: remote-results
        - mountPath: /dev/shm
          name: dshm
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: remote-data
        hostPath:
          path: /nfs_1/alnair/pytorch/segmentation/maskrcnn/coco_dataset/
          type: Directory
      - name: remote-results
        hostPath:
          path: /nfs_1/alnair/results
          type: Directory
      - name: dshm
        emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
      restartPolicy: Never
  backoffLimit: 0
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 3600
